data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Abdoli, Parisa, Talebi, Ali Asghar, Farahani, Samira, Fernandez-Triana, Jose (2019): Three new species of the genus Choeras Mason, 1981 (Hymenoptera: Braconidae, Microgastrinae) from Iran. Zootaxa 4545 (1): 77-92, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.1.4|15 occurrences
